items.sentence: Tom postponed his party until Mary got out of the hospital.
Tom put the new tablecloth he had just bought on the table.
Tom rinsed off the plates and put them into the dishwasher.
Instead of taking a rest, he worked much harder than usual.
Is this the first time you and Tom have done this together?
It looks as if Tom is trying to slow down the negotiations.
Tom claimed that the enormous property was at his disposal.
Tom climbed a nearby tree to see if he could see the ocean.
Tom considered it an insult not to be invited to the party.
Tom considered working for our company, but decided not to.
